name: A Collection of Hauntings
description:
A Collection of Hauntings

An interactive fiction game created in only three days for Cozy Fall Jam 2021!

You play as a member of the Haunting Association. This year, you have been assigned the job of Collector - you must find three ghosts in order to have them help out with haunting and hijinks on Halloween!

The game embodies all the things I love about fall--the atmosphere, the colors, the environments--falling leaves, spooky stories, Halloween, and more! This is not a horror game and there are no scares in it. 

I created, wrote, designed, and programmed the game in Twine.  I'd love to know what you think. You can leave a comment below, hit me up on Twitter @nimblefizz, or email me at nimblefizz@gmail.com. You can also catch me streaming on my channel Twitch channel, where I also play other cozy and indie games.

Enjoy and happy fall!
